def check(pts):
    a, b = [], []
    for x,y in pts:
        a.append(x+y)
        b.append(x-y)
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    return max(a[-1]-a[0], b[-1]-b[0])
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        a, b = [], []
        ind = 0
        for x,y in points:
            a.append([x+y, ind])
            b.append([x-y, ind])
            ind += 1
        a.sort()
        b.sort()
        ans = 10**20
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:a[0][1]] + points[a[0][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:b[0][1]] + points[b[0][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:a[-1][1]] + points[a[-1][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:b[-1][1]] + points[b[-1][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:a[1][1]] + points[a[1][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:b[1][1]] + points[b[1][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:a[-2][1]] + points[a[-2][1]+1:]))
        ans = min(ans, check(points[:b[-2][1]] + points[b[-2][1]+1:]))
        return ans
